incidenceGraph.title: The incidenceGraph schema
incidenceGraph.description: A bipartite graph called incidence graph.

subgraph_name_one.description: The name of the 1st partition subgraph.

subgraph_name_two.description: The name of the 2nd partition subgraph.

var_name_one.description: The label for nodes in the 1st partition.

var_name_two.description: The label for nodes in the 2nd partition.

infer_primal.description: Whether to calculate the primal graph from the incidence edges.

infer_dual.description: Whether to calculate the dual graph from the incidence edges.

second_shape.description: A description of the shape for the nodes in the 2nd partition.

column_distance.description: The distance between the partitions in units.

edges.description: The edges from the 1st partition to the 2nd partition.

id.title: The id schema
id.description: An integer id from the first partition.

list.description: Ids from the second partition connected to 'id'.

generalGraph.description: A graph with various layout parameters.

var_name.description: The label for nodes in the graph.

sort_nodes.description: Whether to sort nodes for the layout based on their id.

need_adj_nodes.description: Whether to consider adjacent nodes of the current bag for the emphasis.

extra_nodes.description: Can contain nodes (with no edges connected).

edges.description: Every (undirected) edge as tuple of two node ids.
